item.title: White House: U.S. to Lift Burdensome AI Development Regulations
item.description: On July 23rd, the White House made an announcement that President Trump will promote the swift construction of artificial intelligence data centers. The US will repeal onerous AI development regulations. (Forex)

item.title: Vaulta (formerly EOS) has secured a $6 million investment commitment from WLFI to advance the development of the Web3 banking sector in the United States.
item.description: On July 23rd, according to official channels, WLFI has entered into a strategic partnership with Vaulta (formerly EOS). WLFI has committed to investing $6 million to boost the development of the Web3 banking industry in the United States.As part of this cooperation:Vaulta's native assets will be integrated into WLFI's macro strategic reserves;WLFI's USD1 stablecoin will be directly incorporated into Vaulta's Web3 banking infrastructure.The aim is to allow users to utilize the speed, security, and freedom of the decentralized financial system to manage, grow, and safeguard their wealth.

item.title: James Wynn's long position faces a new round of liquidation, resulting in a loss of over $300,000
item.description: On July 23rd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, James Wynn's long positions in Bitcoin and PEPE just underwent a new round of liquidation, resulting in a loss of more than $300,000. Even after depositing an additional $1.25 million into Hyperliquid, his balance has decreased to below $300,000.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Drops Below $3,600
item.description: On July 23rd, according to HTX market data, Ethereum dropped below $3,600, with a 24-hour decline of 1.95%.

item.title: Institution: Tariff Uncertainty May Prompt the European Central Bank to Cut Interest Rates More Than Once
item.description: On July 23rd, Analyst Gabriele Foa from Algebris Investments stated in a report that due to tariff uncertainty, the interest rate cut of the European Central Bank may exceed the current expectations of the market. This portfolio manager said: "Trade tensions and tariff developments may lead to the endpoint of the rate-cutting cycle being a bit lower than the current market expectations."Data from LSEG shows that the money market currently anticipates that the ECB will cut rates by another 25 basis points in December. Foa suggested that the spillover effects of tariffs on Europe may take a longer time to become apparent. (FX678)

item.title: Trump Threatens to "Substantially Increase Tariffs" Unless Countries Agree to Open Markets
item.description: On July 23rd, U.S. President Trump posted on his personal social media platform and said, "I will only reduce tariffs if a country agrees to open its market. Otherwise, higher tariffs will be imposed! Japan's market is now open (for the first time in history)! U.S. businesses will achieve prosperity!"

item.title: LookOnChain: SOL Drops Below $190
item.description: On July 23rd, based on HTX market data, SOL dropped below $190, experiencing a 24-hour decrease of 6.10%.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks Experience Broad Decline, Sharplink Gaming Drops by 5.60%
item.description: On July 23rd, at the opening of the US stock market, the Dow increased by 0.36%, the S&P 500 rose by 0.34%, and the Nasdaq also went up by 0.34%. Regarding crypto-related stocks:· Sharplink Gaming witnessed a decline of 5.60%;· Circle saw a fall of 0.46%;· Strategy dropped by 1.54%;· Coinbase decreased by 2.82%;· HOOD fell by 0.90%;· BMNR declined by 0.55%.

item.title: Publicly traded company ENDRA Life Science announced that it will adopt a cryptocurrency treasury strategy
item.description: On July 23rd, according to NLNico, it was disclosed that ENDRA Life Science (NASDAQ: NDRA), a company engaged in developing a medical imaging technology based on the thermoacoustic effect, is going to adopt a cryptocurrency treasury approach and carry out a Bitcoin-based yield generation strategy.

item.title: Bitunix is partnering with KoinX to streamline the cryptocurrency tax filing process
item.description: On July 23rd, Bitunix has officially entered into a partnership with KoinX, which is the leading global cryptocurrency tax platform. This platform is designed to assist users in easily navigating the intricacies of the tax season. Through this integration, users can simply click a few buttons to automatically import transaction data, calculate gains and losses, and generate compliant tax reports.This integration is now in operation. All Bitunix users are eligible for a 30% discount on all KoinX plans. Additionally, the first 100 users who use the code BITUNIX100 will receive a free tax report for their Bitunix transactions. Bitunix is always dedicated to providing a more compliant and user-friendly trading experience for global users.
